ing: 8 ounces sugar snap peas, trimmed and halved
2 cups leftover roast turkey, pulled into bite-sized pieces
des: "A way to use leftover turkey after Thanksgiving."
ins: Toss snap peas, turkey meat, spinach leaves, mixed salad greens, mushrooms, mandarin orange pieces, walnuts, and raspberry vinaigrette dressing lightly in a salad bowl to combine, and serve.
